products.title: Legacy Zinc Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The legacy blind is a beautiful, elegant and modern textured fabric which is available in a range of soft colours. A light filtering fabric ensures complete privacy without completly blocking out the light. A true mid grey shade, this blind is great way to add depth and interest to your window dressing.
